channel.title: Corrupted-souls Server [Recruiting]
channel.description:
Well to start off, this is a 317 base loading 500+
I'ts finally time that corrupted-souls staff team has decided to go live and got our server out there.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2isvxxc.jpg[/img] __________________________________ Bosses- -Bandos -Armadyl -Saradomin -Zamorak -KBD (King Black Dragon) -Dagganoth Kings -Tromented Demons -Corporal Beast -Sea Troll Queen -Nomad -Giant Sea Snake -Avatar Of Destruction
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/mwfczr.png[/img]
__________________________________
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/jt2p7a.png[/img]
Skills-
All skills are working, just more needs to be added to -Hunter -Summoning -Farming -Herblore -Runecraft
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/dgos4h.png[/img]
This 317 is Eco-Based all prices are currently being evaluated to match how easy it is to gain money to keep a stable Eco.
Bugs/Glitches we know of and are fixing. - Following -Auto Player Saving// makes players not go MAD when they dc and rollback........
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ls7ew.png[/img]
Minigames- 100% duel arena 100% barrows 100% pest control 100% jad :-3 95% Warriors Guild
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/14b3mte.jpg[/img]
Currently being hosted buy my VPS, Forums Developer - (The Web Guy) "Aj" is currently making our sexy forums/main page Graphics designers - "Isketch/Brandon" Source Coders - Myself "Daniel also known as Corrupted" "Pirre" "BLANK" "BLANK"
I am currently looking for maybe another 1-2 semi/experienced coders to help with the source.
To apply for a position on our server use the following format
Name - Age - Male/Female - Country - Skype - Position - Experience - How many hours a day can you give to the server - Bio - (a little paragraph about yourself)
~ford rock99~

item.title: Corrupted-souls Server [Recruiting]
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

Well to start off, this is a 317 base loading 500+

I’ts finally time that corrupted-souls staff team has decided to go live and got our server out there.

Bosses-
-Bandos -Armadyl -Saradomin -Zamorak
-KBD (King Black Dragon)
-Dagganoth Kings
-Tromented Demons
-Corporal Beast
-Sea Troll Queen
-Nomad
-Giant Sea Snake
-Avatar Of Destruction

Skills-

All skills are working, just more needs to be added to
-Hunter
-Summoning
-Farming
-Herblore
-Runecraft

This 317 is Eco-Based all prices are currently being evaluated to match how easy it is to gain money to keep a stable Eco.

Bugs/Glitches we know of and are fixing.

  • Following
    -Auto Player Saving// makes players not go MAD when they dc and rollback…

Minigames-
100% duel arena
100% barrows
100% pest control
100% jad :-3
95% Warriors Guild

14b3mte.jpg785×441

Currently being hosted buy my VPS,
Forums Developer - (The Web Guy) “Aj” is currently making our sexy forums/main page
Graphics designers - “Isketch/Brandon”
Source Coders - Myself “Daniel also known as Corrupted” “Pirre” “BLANK” “BLANK”

I am currently looking for maybe another 1-2 semi/experienced coders to help with the source.

To apply for a position on our server use the following format

Name -
Age -
Male/Female -
Country -
Skype -
Position -
Experience -
How many hours a day can you give to the server -
Bio - (a little paragraph about yourself)

~ford rock99~
